entry.title: Personal Furnace
entry.summary:
Author: Flyingthrulife

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,620Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 38

Summary: “Uh-“ Derek took a quick look down at Stiles before looking over at Isaac then back at Erica, at a loss. Was Stiles okay? The Alpha quickly marked his page before setting the book down on the side table behind his head. He put the back of his hand against the boys forehead, trying to gauge if he had a fear. Derek wouldn’t doubt it considering how many hours Stiles had spent staring at his computer screen and having to be reminded to eat, sleep, and (a couple times) use the restroom. “He’s a bit cold?” He ended up saying after some silence.Erica and Isaac both snorted. “He’s always cold. Doesn’t help when we keep the a/c running at like 60 and below.” Isaac commented, looking back down at his notebook and writing a couple sentences.-Or: Stiles wakes up cold (like usual) and goes to find a heat source to curl around. He didn’t think it would be Derek.

entry.title: Restoration
entry.summary:
Author: leatherandflannel

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 13,293Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 62

Summary: Out of range of Derek’s enhanced senses, he lets himself reflect on the night before as he drives. The feel of Derek’s hot mouth on his throat, his chest, his mouth. The way his solid frame felt behind Stiles as he stripped him down, as he begged Derek for everything. Begged Derek to stop the ache, fill the need. It was a fire burning him alive from the inside out and Derek’s fingers were the ice cooling him down with each touch. Derek had felt it too, had growled in his ear about all the things he was going to do to him, how his body was made for Derek and only Derek. He makes it to his driveway before he finally lets the tears fall. Sobs wreck his body, and he just lets it out, knowing he’s out of earshot of any nosy wolves. The crying doesn’t help the pain in his body, but it brings a whole new type of pain, the ache in his heart sharp and heavy.

entry.title: The Darker Side of the Moon
entry.summary:
Author: am0ra

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 26,000Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 84

Summary: The pack was his home. His family.Until, suddenly, it wasn’t.No explanations, no goodbyes—just the crushing silence of those Stiles had spent years risking his life for. He doesn’t understand. He tries to move on. He fails.And then, he disappears.Kidnapped. Isolated. Reduced to nothing in the hands of monsters who don’t need claws or fangs to tear him apart. Every day is a battle between pain and despair, every second a fight to hold on, to not break. But even the strongest souls have a limit.When that limit shatters, something inside him awakens. Something that was never meant to exist.Something that might save him.Or destroy him completely.

entry.summary:

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 14,877Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 137

entry.title: Cologne 2: Electric Bugaboo
entry.summary:
Author: blueinkedbones

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,672Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 14

Summary: “It was an accident,” Stiles says. “Derek, it's not even bad, I swear.”But there are—claw marks on Stiles' shoulder. Still bleeding.And his heartbeat is going a thousand miles an hour.“It's not Eli's fault,” Stiles says, and Derek goes deaf, for a while. Stiles is still talking, rambling, excusing all of it. Derek just breathes, and pulls pain.It takes too long to remember that human bleeding doesn't stop on its own. And then—Derek's speeding through the hotel room.Bandages. And—disinfectant, isn't that—There should be a first aid kit somewhere.“I should've just found a band-aid or something,” Stiles says. “Or asked one of the million people we know who were around. I just... Eli wouldn't wanna be a funny anecdote.”That brings Derek's voice back. “How is this funny? He hurt you.”“See, this is why I didn't wanna tell you,” Stiles says, and Derek stares at him. “Until after the wedding, at least. So I could actually explain, without our whole extended werewolf family catching everything.”Well, they're alone now. “So explain.”

entry.title: The Alpha's List
entry.summary:
Author: Vampire_Finch

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 43,328Chapters: 17/?Kudos: 216

Summary: In the Game of Love, he Made the Rules. The Honorable Derek Hale, Marquis of Redbridge.He is aristocratic, excessively handsome, excessively wealthy, aloof, reserved, arrogant and the powerful Alpha of one of the most renowned packs in the country. He has been an elusive prize for years, the target of desperate society Omega and their matchmaking mothers. But he is not swayed by flirtatious smiles and fine looks, social climbers and fortune hunters. He wants more.When his lack of an Omega causes concern to his mother, uncle and pack a remedy is suggested in the form of a suitable match. Derek draws up a list of qualifications and attributes for his future mate. Can any Omega hope to win the heart of such a demanding bachelor and cynic?Stiles Stilinski the Omega son of a clergyman can only try his best. The Marquis is not sure whether he has discovered the perfect Omega… Or the been the victim of a cruel hoax.

entry.title: Your Love Is The Compass Guiding Me To Happiness
entry.summary:
Author: bistiles_bilinski

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 22,582Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 21

Summary: Derek looked back at him, a small sliver of a smile parting his lips. “Well, Allison let Scott free because she knows the only place he’ll go is to look for her.” He looked at the ropes securing Stiles to the beam before asking quietly, “Are you going to throw yourself overboard if I do?” Derek watched as a wide grin cracked Stiles’ face, the first one he’d seen since the night he’d pointed Stiles in the direction of the tavern that led them to their current situation and it was beautiful. “Cross my heart,” Stiles said. “Besides, I can’t swim and the thought of drowning alone in the ocean is enough to keep me from throwing myself over.”
